name: Kirill Maksimov
tagline: Ruby on Rails software engineer, available for hire in Tel-Aviv area
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
# About me

My name is Kirill Maksimov (קיריל מקסימוב), I am 25 years old. I'm a software engineer. I moved to Israel in September 2012 and became Israeli sitizen. Currently I reside in Ra'anana but soon (in the beginning of February 2013) I will move to Tel-Aviv.

I speak Russian, English, and now I am improving my Hebrew skills. I have been professionally developing web apps since 2004.

I am a experienced in building modern web software with Ruby on Rails stack. I like to fix bugs just as introduce new features.

I have the skill to biild a Ruby on Rails app from scratch, beginning with version control and ending with deployment in less than half an hour.

I contribute to various Ruby open source projects, for example, Mongoid, Opalrb and Simple Captcha.

# Contact information
* Phone number: **0537171872**
* E-mail: **netoneko@gmail.com**
* [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com/in/netoneko)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/netoneko)

# Showcases 
* [Apartment Search](http://apartment-search.herokuapp.com), simple prototype app to show my Ruby style. Check out the [source code](https://github.com/netoneko/apartment-search). Deployed on Heroku with JRuby, built with Sinatra, CoffeeScript, Twitter Bootstrap, Elasticsearch, and Documentcloud's Vusialsearch.
* [Ogoloda.li](http://ogoloda.li/), food recipes site with awesome search and achevements. Built with Ruby on Rails and CoffeeScript.
* [Meanwhile in Raanana](http://raanana.meteor.com), local service that allows to discover various stuff from open APIs. Built with Meteor and CoffeeScript.

# Technologies
* Ruby/JRuby, Ruby on Rails, Sinatra, Capistrano, Thin/Puma, RSpec, Heroku
* JavaScript/CoffeeScript, jQuery, AJAX
* HTML/CSS, HAML/Slim, Less, Twitter Bootstrap
* Linux, nginx, MongoDB, memcached, Redis, PostgreSQL

# Previous work
* Ogoloda.li - my web site about food (in Russian).
* content management platform for Sqcat.com clients (only engineer in a small business venture)
* pulscen.ru (the largest b2b portal in Russia)
* posmotre.li - Russian TVTropes (as a writer)
* new wiki engine at lurkmore.ru (discontinued)
* software for professional education at tandemservice.ru
* CRM system at naumen.ru
* medical CRM system
